catalog.name: East African Great Lake Environments (EAGLE) Climate Downscaling Output

dataset.name: East African Great Lake Environments (EAGLE) Climate Downscaling Output

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - East African Great Lake Environments (EAGLE) Climate Downscaling Output(d010043)

metadata.documentation: These are climate-downscaling simulations over the East African Great Lakes region for the East African Great Lake Environments (EAGLE) project, using the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model. NCAR's Community Earth System Model (CESM) Representative Concentration Pathways (RCP) 8.5 was used for input into the model. Three decadal periods were simulated: present day (2009-2018), mid-century (2055-2064), and end of century (2090-2099.).
